amountQuestion: Please enter your loan amount, e.g., 200000 for $200,000.
intQuestion: Please enter your interest rate, e.g., 3.8 for 3.8%.
durationQuestion: Please enter your loan duration as an integer, e.g., 30 for 30 years.
againQuestion: Would you like to perform another calculation? (y/n)
invalidagainQuestion: Please enter "y" for yes or "n" for no.
